private_settings.name: synchronized_segments
private_settings.title: List of segment ids that should be synchronized with customer.io (Empty to send no one)

private_settings.name: anonymous_events
private_settings.title: set if Connector should send events about user who id is undefined

private_settings.name: events_filter
private_settings.title: What events should be sent to customer.io. Hull event names should be provided (not Customerio). Empty sends nothing

private_settings.name: batch_delete_users
private_settings.title: set if connector should delete users that does not match synchronized_segments
